# for mac : tex shinobi & Ïπ¥ÎùºÎπÑÎÑà ANSIIÎ∞∞Ïó¥ ÌÇ§ÎßµÌïë

> **Summary**
> Îß•ÏóêÏÑú Tex ShinobiÏôÄ Ïπ¥ÎùºÎπÑÎÑàÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ ÌÇ§ Îß§ÌïëÏùÑ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏóê ÎåÄÌïú ÏïàÎÇ¥. Karabiner Complex Rules GeneratorÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ IJKL Î∞è UO ÌÇ§ Ï°∞Ìï©ÏùÑ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÍ≥†, T480 Î™®Îç∏Ïóê ÎßûÍ≤å Ï°∞Ï†ïÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÎèÑ ÏÑ§Î™Ö. HammerspoonÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ CTRL+HJKLÎ°ú Î∞©Ìñ•ÌÇ§ Ïù¥ÎèôÏùÑ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÎèÑ Ìè¨Ìï®ÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

# Tex Shinobi Ïö©

üîó [https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#](https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#)

üîó [https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#](https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#)

```json
{
  "title": "Custom_IJKLUO",
  "rules": [
    {
      "description": "IJKL",
      "manipulators": [
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "i"
          },
          "to": [
            {
              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "up_arrow"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "j"
          },
          "to": [
            {
              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "left_arrow"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "k"
          },
          "to": [
            {
              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "down_arrow"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "l"
          },
          "to": [
            {
              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "right_arrow"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "description": "UO",
      "manipulators": [
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "u"
          },
          "to": [
            {
              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "left_arrow",
              "modifiers": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "o"
          },
          "to": [
            {
              "repeat": true,

                "left_gui"

            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "description": "SHIFT + IJKL",
      "manipulators": [
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ],
              "optional": [
                "left_shift"

            },

              "lazy": false,

            }
          ]

    },
    {

      "manipulators": [
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_alt",

                "left_alt",

            {
              "repeat": true,

                "left_gui",

            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "description": "Opt+Cmd+UKI",
      "manipulators": [
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui",

          "to": [
            {
              "repeat": true,

          ]

                "left_gui"

            }

}
```

# T480 Ïö©

(T480ÏùÄ alt ÌïòÍ≥† cmd ÏúÑÏπòÍ∞Ä Îã¨ÎùºÏÑú Ï°∞Ï†ïÌï¥Ï§òÏïºÌïúÎã§)

![Image](image_0e5149a365f9.png)

üîó [https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#](https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#)

```json
{
  "title": "T480_Custom_IJKLUO",
  "rules": [
    {
      "description": "T480_IJKL",
      "manipulators": [
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_alt"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "i"
          },
          "to": [

              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "up_arrow"

              "mandatory": [
                "left_alt"

              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "left_arrow"
```

# HHKB PRO2 Ïö© 

> üí° **Ïπ¥ÎùºÎπÑÎÑà ÎßêÍ≥† Îî∞Î°ú Ïì∞ÎäîÍ≤å ÏûàÎÇòÎ¥Ñ**
> üîó [https://www.clien.net/service/board/cm_mac/17797232](https://www.clien.net/service/board/cm_mac/17797232)
>
> ÏïÑÎûòÏ≤òÎüº ÌïòÏãúÎ©¥ CTRL+HJKLÎ°ú Î∞©Ìñ•ÌÇ§ Ïù¥ÎèôÏù¥ Îê† Í≤ÅÎãàÎã§. Î∏îÎü≠ ÏßÄÏ†ï, Îã®Ïñ¥ Ïù¥Îèô Í∞ôÏùÄ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä Í∏∞Îä•Îì§ÎèÑ SHIFT, ALT Ï∂îÍ∞Ä Ï°∞Ìï©ÌïòÎ©¥ Ïûò Îê©ÎãàÎã§.
>
> 1. Hammerspoon ÏÑ§Ïπò
>
> - 
> [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/hammerspoon/releases/tag/0.9.97](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/hammerspoon/releases/tag/0.9.97)
>
> 2. Hammerspoon Preferences
>
> - Behavior
> - Launch Hammerspoon at login
> - Show menu icon
> - Accessibility
> - Accessibility is enabled. You're all set!
> - Enable Accessbility (ÎÖπÏÉâ)
> 3. Open Config (init.lua)
>
> 4. Reload Config
>
>
